ProfileHeader.fullStackEngineer: Full-stack engineer specializing in frontend architecture and blockchain integrations | Software Engineer | Technology leadership | Web3 | React, React-Router, Preact, Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind, IPFS, Ether, EVM, Wagmi, Viem | Fixing your vibe code

About.title: About
About.firstParagraph: Software engineer with over 20 years of front-end experience, 5 years in Web3, and hands-on full-stack and AI agent integration expertise.
About.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: If you're thinking of offering me a long-term contract, please send a request here or via email at hello@rocco.me
About.fullStackDeveloper: I design, refactor, and ship products that merge blockchain transparency with real user value, from DeFi and RWA platforms to secure browser extensions and gamified apps. I lead small agile teams with a focus on mentorship, code quality, long-term sustainability and not just delivery speed.
About.currentlyWorking: Currently working as Lead Software Engineer at The Web3 Ninja, where I mentor developers, build full-stack blockchain integrations for DApps and Web2 apps, and optimize API communication to improve speed and reduce gas costs.
About.lastParagraph: I write code. I build systems. I work in Web3, AI, and Cybersecurity. I mentor junior devs and career changers. From South Italy to the globe, I develop decentralized applications (DApps) that redefine user experiences: tokenized assets, DeFi platforms, and smart contract integrations. My recent projects have delivered millions in liquidity, supported 5M+ monthly users with 3k concurrent, and achieved significant improvements in code quality and team productivity.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.ledFrontendDevelopment: Mentored 5 developers; placed 3 in junior roles. Built full-stack blockchain integrations for 3 DApps and Web2 apps. Optimized API communication, improving speed by 15% and cutting gas costs.
Experience.developedInteractiveUI: Delivered UI for Lotsaloot™, a three-tier jackpot system. Designed a fast-hitting reward loop to maximize engagement. Strengthened jackpot portfolios with consistent micro-reward feedback.
Experience.createdDashboardInterfaces: Led a 12-member team, achieving a 30% productivity boost. Reduced bugs by 25% and raised code quality 40%. Supported 5M monthly users with 3k concurrent.
Experience.highUserEngagementDesc: Led development of widely used platforms and applications.
Experience.majorRefactoringDesc: Improved code efficiency and reduced technical debt at iControlApp.
Experience.defiDappLaunchDesc: Reduced bugs by 25% and implemented better workflows and code standards.
Experience.improvedCodeQualityDesc: Provided mentorship and career guidance to junior developers.
Experience.boostedProductivityDesc: Created development standards for better code quality and consistency.
Experience.designConsistencyDesc: Built open-source tools to protect users from phishing and fraud.
Experience.addYourWorkExperience: Add your work experience to help others find you.
Experience.ledFrontendDevelopmentFull: Led frontend development for multiple client projects. Implemented responsive UI designs and optimized web performance. Mentored junior developers and established coding standards. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Experience.developedInteractiveUIFull: Developed interactive user interfaces using React and modern CSS frameworks. Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect components and animations. Built reusable component libraries and maintained design systems.
Experience.createdDashboardInterfacesFull: Created dashboard interfaces for security monitoring tools. Worked with backend team to integrate APIs and real-time data visualization components. Implemented security best practices in frontend development.
Experience.providedWebDevelopmentServices: Provided web development services to small and medium businesses. Built custom websites and web applications using modern technologies. Managed client relationships and project timelines.

Recommendations.title: Recommendations
Recommendations.workedWith: {name} worked with {person} in the same team
Recommendations.exceptionalDeveloper: Rocco is an exceptional frontend developer with a keen eye for detail and a talent for creating elegant user interfaces. His ability to translate complex requirements into intuitive designs is remarkable. He consistently delivered high-quality code on our shared projects and was always willing to help others on the team.
Recommendations.impressiveSkills: I had the pleasure of managing Rocco on several critical projects. His technical skills in frontend development are truly impressive, particularly in React and modern JavaScript. He's proactive, reliable, and has an exceptional ability to solve complex problems. His work consistently exceeded client expectations, and he was a valuable asset to our team.

Volunteering.title: Volunteering
Volunteering.helpingPeers: So far I have been helping around ~12 peers, 5 got a position in first 1~4 months.
Volunteering.helpedCareerSwitch: I even helped a 32 yrs old in his job switch career.
Volunteering.positionedInterns: And I positioned 2 interns, last year (middle 2023), to their first junior positions.
Volunteering.gettingBetter: So I'm getting better at it. But oftentimes it also depends on the person and how much motivated is.
Volunteering.dedicatingTime: I'm dedicating part of my day to help people in need around Africa and the Middle East with crowdfunding/fundraisings initiatives.
Volunteering.campaignsBelowAre: Below are some of the campaigns.
Volunteering.helpAbdulKarim: Help Abdul Karim Heal: A War Child's Fight for Life
Volunteering.bornUnderBombs: Born Under Bombs, Now Fighting for Every Step: Support Baby Abdul Karim's Urgent Medical Journey
Volunteering.saveEliasFamily: Save Elias & His Family: From Tent to Safety
Volunteering.helpGazaFamily: Help a Gaza family survive famine, illness & homelessness. Your support brings them closer to food, shelter & a safer future.
Volunteering.trustedGuide: Your Trusted Guide to Online Safety and Protection from Scams, Phishing, and Malware. Expert Cybersecurity Services on subscription.

RecommendationsPage.askForRecommendationDesc: Request recommendations from colleagues to strengthen your profile.

hiroshiTanaka.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
hiroshiTanaka.title: Senior Software Engineer at Guideline
hiroshiTanaka.content: In my experience working with Rocco, I've been consistently impressed by his unique blend of professionalism and warmth. He effortlessly cultivates a collaborative atmosphere that is both light-hearted and focused. Rocco's knowledge in software engineering is expansive, but what truly sets him apart is his approachability. Despite his expertise, he never comes off as intimidating. Instead, he's always eager to share, guide, and support. It's truly a privilege to work alongside someone with such a rare combination of qualities.

mateoFernandez.name: Mateo Fernández
mateoFernandez.title: Senior Solidity Engineer
mateoFernandez.content: Rocco is a great frontend developer who make any designs become real for end users. He is proficient: always ask questions to understand tiny details that will make the difference for a great product, propose better solutions & technologies. The code is always clean, organised and well refactored. On top of that, Rocco is always available when needed and is very friendly and always supports others

larsNielsen.name: Lars Nielsen
larsNielsen.title: Product-first software CEO, building next-gen enterprise software for commerce
larsNielsen.content: Rocco is the type of person you want on your team, highly skilled and without any fear of diving in on the deep end of the pool. He rearchitected our web plattform from the ground up in a matter of months, something that was considered impossible by several people prior to Rocco. In addition to his technical prowess, he's an affable person that quickly built a personal bond to our team, with his humor and great attitude. I can't recommend Rocco enough!

emmaVanDerBerg.name: Emma van der Berg
emmaVanDerBerg.title: Full stack developer
emmaVanDerBerg.relationship: Emma worked with Rocco on the same team
emmaVanDerBerg.content: When the company ran out of people to do a Angular + Gulp project and asked me if I knew someone that could help out, I knew Rocco was the guy that would save the day. Rocco managed to achieve amazing results within a very limited timeframe, and even when put under a lot of stress, he maintained his eye for detail and never lost focus.

rajeshKumar.name: Rajesh Kumar
rajeshKumar.title: Technical Architect at HCL Technologies
rajeshKumar.relationship: Rajesh worked with Rocco on the same team
rajeshKumar.content: Rocco is an excellent Front End Developer with lots of knowledge in Front End Technologies. He knows lot of tools which supports the development lot more easier and faster. Whatever the tool Rocco is using he will follow the standards always. He is a good team member and always dedicated to work which i noticed when working on the same project. He will finish his tasks by working extra hours.

ingridSchmidt.name: Ingrid Schmidt
ingridSchmidt.title: senior product owner
ingridSchmidt.relationship: Ingrid worked with Rocco on the same team
ingridSchmidt.content: Rocco is a great senior front end developer. In my team he did the set up of the framework for the Drupal theme for the new website. He will do his utter best to finish the job with the best result. Rocco is a devoted employee and a great guy to work with. I love his hard work and happy energy. As a product owner it is great to work with Rocco because you know he will get the job done.

lukasNovak.name: Lukas Novak
lukasNovak.title: Fullstack Go/TS/LLM
lukasNovak.relationship: Lukas worked with Rocco on the same team
lukasNovak.content: We've spend some fun time with Rocco while working on a CoffeeScript and Backbone based Phonegap app. He pursues clean code and separation of concerns in his frontend work, which is decorated by expressive comments. He always tries to be up to date with latest frameworks.

carlosMendoza.name: Carlos Mendoza
carlosMendoza.title: Staff Security Engineer at Bird
carlosMendoza.relationship: Carlos worked with Rocco on the same team
carlosMendoza.content: Rocco is a very attentive to detail person. He makes sure that everything works according to specs and prepares for it. He also is the perfect colleague to work along side with. He always tries to help others when he can, and makes sure you have received all the information that was needed.

pierreDubois.name: Pierre Dubois
pierreDubois.title: Information / DevOps Engineer
pierreDubois.relationship: Pierre worked with Rocco on the same team
pierreDubois.content: Rocco has a highly professional standard concerning front-end development and automated development tools. It is a pleasure and great fun to work with Rocco. He is honest, speaks his mind, can be stubborn at times but manages to make everyone smile. Rocco set a very clear path for himself, "to learn, keep improving and put his skills into practice". I learned a lot from Rocco. His contributions to the teams are of high quality and created a sustainable platform for front-end development. I hope to work with Rocco again someday and meet more people like him.

marcoRossi.name: Marco Rossi
marcoRossi.title: PHP Symfony/Drupal Back-end Developer @European Commission DIGIT
marcoRossi.relationship: Marco worked with Rocco but on different teams
marcoRossi.content: Rocco is an high motivated and qualified IT Consultant. He has a strong attitude to day by day challenges and he pay attention to perform high quality final results saving as much time as possible. That's why he's constantly upgrading himself to the newest technologies, mainly Front-end, to obtain the maximum results in terms of time-quality. He is also a nice guy and it was a pleasure to work beside him both professionally and personally.

jakubKowalski.name: Jakub Kowalski
jakubKowalski.title: Head of development at Praetorian Technology
jakubKowalski.relationship: Jakub worked with Rocco on the same team
jakubKowalski.content: It has been a real pleasure to work with Rocco on projects in Youwin. He has got great knowledge in every area of web development: starting with configuration of development and running environments, web servers and caching systems going through backend dev ending with vast JavaScript, HTML, HTML5 and CSS skills to deliver frontend. Rocco is a person who can be alone given great tasks as he can handle the whole process by himself, yet in the same time with his open mind and potential to share and acquire knowledge is a great team player who likes to consult opinions in order to deliver the best quality products. Rational and agile oriented can work in an environment running on any pace. Great mind, great friend, social person with all the skills which a web dev company may ever need. Rocco is the best choice for a fantastic team of bright developers as with him you can go beyond standards.

oliverMuller.name: Oliver Müller
oliverMuller.title: Software Engineer | Software Development | Product
oliverMuller.content: Rocco helped me grow my developer career by providing me with an opportunity to learn real world skills through real world projects. The amount of knowledge I gained during my internship helped me grow from intern to junior developer and land a job at an IoT company after the 3 months. He is very experienced and installed good principles in me which I am very thankful for. Highly recommend if you want a very knowledgable software engineer & leader.

personal.title: Software Engineer / Tech Lead
personal.headline: Blockchain & Dapps | Agentic AI | Cybersecurity
personal.about: Software engineer with over 20 years of experience in front-end engineering, 5 years in Web3 integrations, and hands-on full-stack development. Expert in React, Svelte, TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js, TailwindCSS, MongoDB, and cloud-native solutions. I build decentralized apps merging blockchain, AI, and real-world utility, with a leadership focus on mentorship, scalable design, and clean code.

exp1.description: Leading Web3 integration projects and mentoring junior developers.
highlights: Mentored 5 interns, placed 3 as junior devs.
Built 3 DApps and APIs improving transaction speed by 15%.
Reduced gas fees via optimized blockchain integration.

exp2.description: Leading front-end development for gaming platforms.
highlights: Developed UI for Lotsaloot™ jackpot system.
Enhanced player engagement with tiered reward logic.
Collaborated across teams to increase retention metrics.

exp3.description: Led technical development for the Shiba Inu ecosystem.
highlights: Led 12-member team, boosted productivity by 30%.
Reduced bugs by 25% and raised code quality 40%.
Served 5M users and 3k concurrent visitors.

exp4.description: Leading front-end development for DeFi applications.
highlights: Deployed SPA with $20M+ liquidity.
Created SDK reducing integration time 50%.
Released ecosystem-wide design library increasing dev speed 25%.

exp5.description: Leading Web3 and crypto application development.
highlights: Supervised 10+ decentralized projects.
Mentored 4 frontend developers.
Improved scalability and UI consistency.

exp6.description: Building DeFi infrastructure and smart contract integrations.
highlights: Built vesting and farming dashboard integrated with Ethereum.
Developed smart contract interaction layers for DeFi operations.
Delivered enterprise-grade Web2 refactoring projects.
Optimized legacy systems for cloud-readiness.
Contributed to scientific web apps for chemical data systems.
Developed Angular-based interfaces for cross-platform tablets.
Built multilingual advertising marketplace with 3M+ visitors/month.
Improved SEO and user engagement on high-traffic portals.
